generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including modern structures with windows and commercial signage.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in the median, indicating vegetation.
- person: A person is visible on the left sidewalk, standing near a bicycle.
- rider: Two individuals are riding bicycles on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible, including a black SUV in the middle of the road and other vehicles further ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right sidewalk near the curb.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections ahead, hanging from poles.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including stop signs and directional signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: Two bicycles are being ridden by people on the left side of the road.
